languages.text: {n}Маражай усмехается и плавным движением берет Караэля за подбородок — обманчиво бережно, ибо беловолосый друкари вздрагивает и замирает, словно его парализовало.{/n} "Терпение, мой зверек. Сосредоточься на своих поручениях... и ты сам не заметишь, как я вернусь к вам".

{n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай усмехается и плавным движением берет Караэля за подбородок — обманчиво бережно, ибо беловолосый друкари вздрагивает и замирает, словно его парализовало.{/n} "Терпение, мой зверек. Сосредоточься на своих поручениях... и ты сам не заметишь, как я вернусь к вам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and takes Kharael by the chin with a smooth motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari twitch and freeze.{/n} "Patience, critter. Concentrate on your duties... And I will be back with you before you know it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and takes Kharael by the chin with a smooth motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari twitch and freeze.{/n} "Patience, critter. Concentrate on your duties... And I will be back with you before you know it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht und packt Kharael mit einer flüssigen Bewegung am Kinn. Durch die täuschend sanfte Handlung zuckt der weißhaarige Drukhari zusammen und erstarrt dann.{/n} "Geduld, mein Haustier. Konzentriert Euch auf Eure Pflichten ... und ich bin zurück, ehe Ihr es bemerkt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht und packt Kharael mit einer flüssigen Bewegung am Kinn. Durch die täuschend sanfte Handlung zuckt der weißhaarige Drukhari zusammen und erstarrt dann.{/n} "Geduld, mein Haustier. Konzentriert Euch auf Eure Pflichten ... und ich bin zurück, ehe Ihr es bemerkt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋笑了起来，以流畅的动作抓住了卡瑞尔的下巴。这个看似温和的动作，让眼前这个白发黑暗灵族畏缩不已，一动都不敢动。{/n}“耐心点，我的宠物。认真履行好你的使命……我很快就会回到你身边。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋笑了起来，以流畅的动作抓住了卡瑞尔的下巴。这个看似温和的动作，让眼前这个白发黑暗灵族畏缩不已，一动都不敢动。{/n}“耐心点，我的宠物。认真履行好你的使命……我很快就会回到你身边。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai glousse et saisit Kharael par le menton dans un élan gracieux. Le geste patelin fait subitement reculer puis s'immobiliser le Drukhari aux cheveux blancs.{/n} « Patience, mon petit. Concentrez-vous sur vos responsabilités... Et je serai de retour en un rien de temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai glousse et saisit Kharael par le menton dans un élan gracieux. Le geste patelin fait subitement reculer puis s'immobiliser le Drukhari aux cheveux blancs.{/n} « Patience, mon petit. Concentrez-vous sur vos responsabilités... Et je serai de retour en un rien de temps. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se ríe y agarra a Kharael por la barbilla en un gesto fluido. El acto, engañosamente amable, basta para que el Drukhari de pelo cano palidezca y se quede quieto.{/n} «Paciencia, mascota mía. Concéntrate en tus deberes... volveré antes de que te des cuenta».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se ríe y agarra a Kharael por la barbilla en un gesto fluido. El acto, engañosamente amable, basta para que el Drukhari de pelo cano palidezca y se quede quieto.{/n} «Paciencia, mascota mía. Concéntrate en tus deberes... volveré antes de que te des cuenta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはほくそ笑むと流れるような動きでカラエルのあごを掴んだ。何かを企むようなやさしい動作は白髪のデュカーリをひるませ、動きを止めさせる。{/n}「辛抱するんだ、俺様の下僕よ。仕事に集中していろ…俺はすぐに戻る」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはほくそ笑むと流れるような動きでカラエルのあごを掴んだ。何かを企むようなやさしい動作は白髪のデュカーリをひるませ、動きを止めさせる。{/n}「辛抱するんだ、俺様の下僕よ。仕事に集中していろ…俺はすぐに戻る」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kıkırdayıp atik bir hareketle Kharael'i çenesinden yakalıyor. Nazikmiş gibi görünen bu hareket; beyaz saçlı Drukhari'nin irkilmesine, ardından da kaskatı kesilmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "Sabırlı ol evcil hayvancığım. Görevlerine odaklan. Göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar yanına dönmüş olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai chuckles and seizes Kharael by the chin in a fluid motion, the deceptively gentle act causing the white-haired Drukhari to flinch and then go still.{/n} "Patience, my pet. Concentrate on your duties... and I will be back with you before you know it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kıkırdıyor ve atik bir hareketle Kharael'i çenesinden yakalıyor. Bu nazikmiş gibi görünen hareket, beyaz saçlı Drukhari'nin irkilmesine, ardından da kaskatı kesilmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "Sabırlı ol evcil hayvancığım. Görevlerine odaklan. Göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar yanına dönmüş olacağım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
